data.eml:eml: Spiradiclis pengshuiensis (Ophiorrhizeae, Rubioideae), a new species from Chongqing, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pan, Bo, Ma, Hu-Sheng, Wang, Rui-Jiang (2016): Spiradiclis pengshuiensis (Ophiorrhizeae, Rubioideae), a new species from Chongqing, China. PhytoKeys 63: 41-45, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.63.8016, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.63.8016
